00072 typedef enum {
00073         GP_EVENT_UNKNOWN,       /* unknown and unhandled event */

00075         GP_EVENT_FILE_ADDED,    /* CameraFilePath* = file path on camfs */

00125 typedef struct _CameraFunctions CameraFunctions;
00126 struct _CameraFunctions {
00127 
00128         /* Those will be called before and after each operation */
00129         CameraPrePostFunc pre_func;
00130         CameraPrePostFunc post_func;
00131 
00132         CameraExitFunc exit;
